statements: SELECT * FROM trains_safety_compliance_records;
SELECT id, record_type, inspector, compliance_status FROM trains_safety_compliance_records;
SELECT * FROM trains_safety_compliance_records WHERE train_id = 1001;
SELECT train_id, inspector, inspection_date FROM trains_safety_compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT inspector, record_type, compliance_status FROM trains_safety_compliance_records ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trains_safety_compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT train_id, inspector, inspection_date FROM trains_safety_compliance_records WHERE record_type = 'Maintenance' ORDER BY train_id, inspection_date;
SELECT id, train_id, inspection_date, record_type, inspector FROM trains_safety_compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND inspector = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM trains_safety_compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE OR record_type = 'Safety Check' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC, train_id;
SELECT inspector, COUNT(*) AS inspection_count FROM trains_safety_compliance_records GROUP BY inspector HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY inspection_count DESC, inspector;
SELECT * FROM trains;
SELECT train_id, train_name FROM trains WHERE safety_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure WHERE infra_type = 'Bridge';
SELECT infra_id, infra_type, compliance_status FROM infrastructure ORDER BY infra_type DESC;
SELECT train_name FROM trains WHERE safety_rating < 2;
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE safety_rating > 5 ORDER BY train_name ASC;
SELECT train_name, safety_rating FROM trains WHERE safety_rating > 8 ORDER BY safety_rating DESC;
SELECT train_name, safety_rating FROM trains WHERE train_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY safety_rating ASC;
SELECT train_name, safety_rating FROM trains WHERE safety_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY safety_rating ASC;
SELECT train_name, safety_rating FROM trains WHERE train_name = 'Express' OR train_name = 'Superfast' ORDER BY safety_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrainRecords;
SELECT train_id, train_type, inspection_date FROM TrainRecords WHERE train_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM SafetyCompliance WHERE safety_rating = 'Good';
SELECT infrastructure_id, infrastructure_type FROM InfrastructureRecords WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_id, compliance_status FROM SafetyCompliance ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrainRecords WHERE train_id = 1;
SELECT train_id, train_type FROM TrainRecords WHERE inspection_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT inspection_location, train_id, train_type FROM TrainRecords ORDER BY train_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM InfrastructureRecords WHERE inspection_location LIKE '%station%';
SELECT infrastructure_type, inspection_date FROM InfrastructureRecords WHERE inspection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, train_name, route, departure_time FROM trains WHERE train_name = 'Express Train';
SELECT * FROM train_safety_records WHERE safety_rating > 4 ORDER BY safety_rating DESC;
SELECT infra_name, location FROM infrastructure WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT record_id, compliance_status, inspector_name FROM infra_compliance_records ORDER BY compliance_date ASC;
SELECT train_name, route, departure_time FROM trains WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01' LIMIT 3;
SELECT train_name, route FROM trains;
SELECT * FROM trains WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT infra_name, location FROM infrastructure ORDER BY infra_name DESC;
SELECT train_name, route, departure_time FROM trains WHERE departure_time < NOW();
SELECT train_name, route, safety_rating, notes FROM trains JOIN train_safety_records ON trains.id = train_safety_records.train_id;
SELECT * FROM TrainSafetyRecords;
SELECT train_id, violation_type, violation_description FROM TrainSafetyRecords WHERE record_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT location_name, location_type, last_inspection_date FROM InfrastructureInfo WHERE location_type = 'Station';
SELECT train_id, train_type, manufacturer FROM TrainInfo ORDER BY train_id DESC;
SELECT record_id, compliance_type, status FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM TrainSafetyRecords WHERE violation_type='Safety Hazard' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT train_id, violation_type, violation_description FROM TrainSafetyRecords WHERE violation_type='Maintenance Issue' ORDER BY train_id ASC;
SELECT location_id, inspection_type, inspection_result FROM InfrastructureSafetyRecords WHERE inspection_result='Failed Inspection' ORDER BY location_id;
SELECT train_type, train_model, manufacturer FROM TrainInfo ORDER BY train_type ASC, train_model DESC;
SELECT compliance_type, record_date, description, status FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE status='Open';
